bibl.title: The Proper Name Pakiçw / Pãkiow. <Pakias / Pakios>
bibl.note: Pakiçw occurs in S.B. VI, 9181, 9 = P. Cairo Isidor. 29, 9, and in S.B. I, 5124 [= Charta Borgiana], 215. It is reasonable to postulate the proper name Pãkiow in P. Oxy. VII, 1048, 2. <Pakias, Pakios>
SIJPESTEIJN P.J., The Proper Name Pakiçw / Pãkiow. <Pakias / Pakios>
145.4 Charta Borgiana P. Cairo Isidor. 29 P. Oxy. VII, 1048
